ISSUE.TITLE: Move/rename "PayPal Zettle" menu item
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 Currently the "PayPal Zettle" menu item is located in Admin area > Configuration > POS > PayPal Zettle. Let's move it to Admin area > Configuration > PayPal Zettle. And rename it to "PayPal Zettle (POS)". So the final way will be Admin area > Configuration > PayPal Zettle (POS). It'll be located between "PayPal Commerce" and "Local plugins" menu items

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7263 Zettle plugin. Fix active menu item name
